com.jogamp.opengl.impl.macosx.cgl
Class CGL

java.lang.Object
  com.jogamp.opengl.impl.macosx.cgl.CGL

public class CGL
extends Object

Provides access to the MacOSX-specific OpenGL vendor extensions. See GLBase for more information.
